body_html: Unfortunately, the stream-executor team is still working on their own open-sourcing. That's why TensorFlow currently carries a copy. When they are ready for their own open-sourcing, we will drop our copy, and refer to the public one. But for now, you are doing the right thing. Although we cannot accept the pull request, we will pass them to the stream-executor to make the change upstream.

body: Unfortunately, the stream-executor team is still working on their own open-sourcing. That's why TensorFlow currently carries a copy. When they are ready for their own open-sourcing, we will drop our copy, and refer to the public one. But for now, you are doing the right thing. Although we cannot accept the pull request, we will pass them to the stream-executor to make the change upstream.
